mapper.select: SELECT count(case when status = '0' then 1 end) as 'ok_count' ,count(case when status = '1' then 1 end) as 'late_count' ,count(case when status = '2' then 1 end) as 'absence_count' ,E.rest_time as 'vacation_time' FROM ATTENDANCE A JOIN EMPLOYEE E on A.username = E.username WHERE A.username = #{username} and date_format(date, '%Y-%m') = #{date};

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IF(AED.aStats != '2', CASE WHEN V.vacation_type = '0' THEN 0 WHEN V.vacation_type = '1' THEN TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF('13:00:00', AED.dEndTime)) WHEN V.vacation_type = '2' THEN TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(AED.dStartTime, '12:00:00')) ELSE 28800 END, 0)),0) as 'totalWorkTime', IFNULL(SUM(IF(V.approval_flag = '1', CASE WHEN V.vacation_type = '0' THEN 28800 WHEN V.vacation_type = '1' THEN TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(AED.dStartTime, '12:00:00')) WHEN V.vacation_type = '2' THEN TIME_TO_SEC(timediff(AED.dEndTime, '13:00:00')) END, 0 )), 0) as ' totalUseVac', IFNULL(SUM(IF(AED.aStats != '2', CASE WHEN V.vacation_type = '0' THEN 0 WHEN V.vacation_type = '1' THEN IFNULL(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(AED.end_time, AED.dEndTime)), 0) WHEN V.vacation_type = '2' THEN 0 ELSE IFNULL(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(AED.end_time, AED.dEndTime)), 0) END, 0) ),0) as 'overtime'
FROM ( SELECT AE.id, AE.date, AE.start_time, AE.end_time, D.start_time as 'dStartTime', D.end_time as 'dEndTime', aStats FROM ( SELECT A.id, A.date, A.start_time, A.end_time, E.dep_id, A.status as 'aStats' FROM ATTENDANCE A JOIN EMPLOYEE E on A.username = E.username WHERE A.username = #{usernaem} and date_format(A.date, '%Y-%m') = #{date} ) AE JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.id = AE.dep_id ) AED LEFT OUTER JOIN VACATION V ON AED.id = V.a_id;
